TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit EventLogEntry extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class EventLogEntry Inherits Component Implements ISerializable
public ref class EventLogEntry sealed : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type EventLogEntry = class inherit Component interface ISerializable

summary.span: 將單一記錄封裝於事件記錄檔中。

span.span: Encapsulates a single record in the event log.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會建立的執行個體直接使用時類別。You usually will not create instances of directly when working with the class. 隸屬類別包含的集合執行個體，使用讀取時，您重複處理類別的索引成員。The member of the class contains a collection of instances, which you iterate over when reading by using the class index member. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 在此範例中，`switch`陳述式會使用主控台輸入來搜尋指定的事件類型的事件記錄檔項目。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified event type. 如果找到相符項目，則記錄項目來源資訊會顯示在主控台中。If a match is found, log entry source information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Category As String
public: property System::String ^ Category { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與這個項目的 屬性相關聯的文字。

span.span: Gets the text associated with the property for this entry.

value.span: 應用程式特定分類的文字。

span.span: The application-specific category text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個應用程式 （事件來源） 可以定義自己的編號的分類和它們所對應的文字字串。Each application (event source) can define its own numbered categories and the text strings to which they are mapped. 事件檢視器可以使用分類來篩選事件記錄檔中。The Event Viewer can use the category to filter events in the log.

exception.span: 無法將空間配置給與分類相關聯的其中一個插入字串。

span.span: The space could not be allocated for one of the insertion strings associated with the category.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CategoryNumber As Short
public: property short CategoryNumber { short get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("An ID for the category of this event entry.")

summary.span: 取得事件記錄檔項目的分類編號。

span.span: Gets the category number of the event log entry.

value.span: 這個項目的應用程式特定分類編號。

span.span: The application-specific category number for this entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個應用程式 （事件來源） 可以定義自己的編號的分類和它們所對應的文字字串。Each application (event source) can define its own numbered categories and the text strings to which they are mapped. 事件檢視器可以使用分類來篩選事件記錄檔中。The Event Viewer can use the category to filter events in the log. 類別必須從 1 開始連續編號。The categories must be numbered consecutively beginning with the number 1. 所指定的類別數字屬性。The category number is specified by the property. 事件檢視器可以顯示類別目錄做為數值，或它可以做為資源識別項使用的類別，來顯示的當地語系化類別目錄字串。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Data As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Data { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("Binary data associated with this event entry.")

summary.span: 取得與項目相關聯的二進位資料。

span.span: Gets the binary data associated with the entry.

value.span: 保存與項目相關的二進位資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: An array of bytes that holds the binary data associated with the entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會建立陣列，其中包含的項目事件特定的二進位資料組合的十六進位和文字格式顯示的 事件檢視器的複本。Getting this property creates an array that holds a copy of the entry's event-specific binary data, which the Event Viewer displays in combined hexadecimal and text format. 事件特定資料時，有時會用來儲存應用程式會處理獨立於事件檢視器中，例如的資訊，以將記錄檔中的報表。Event-specific data is sometimes used to store information that the application will process independently of the Event Viewer, for example, to make reports from the log file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EntryType As EventLogEntryType
public: property System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType EntryType { System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個項目的事件類型。

span.span: Gets the event type of this entry.

value.span: 與事件記錄檔項目相關聯的事件類型。

span.span: The event type that is associated with the entry in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有事件類型具有定義完善的一般資料，並可以選擇性地包含事件特定資料。All event types have well-defined common data and can optionally include event-specific data. 每個事件是單一型別，表示應用程式時報告事件。Each event is of a single type, which the application indicates when it reports the event. 事件檢視器會使用事件類型來決定要在事件記錄檔的清單檢視中顯示的圖示。The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此範例中，`switch`陳述式會使用主控台輸入來搜尋指定的事件記錄檔項目。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified . 如果找到相符項目，則記錄項目來源資訊會顯示在主控台中。If a match is found, log entry source information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Equals(class System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry otherEntry) cil managed
Public Function Equals (otherEntry As EventLogEntry) As Boolean

span.span: The to compare.

summary.span: 在兩個事件記錄檔項目之間進行比較。

span.span: Performs a comparison between two event log entries.

returns.span: 如果 物件相同，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the objects are identical; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行兩個物件之間的位元組的比較。This method performs a byte-by-byte comparison between the two objects. 它不會判斷是否這兩個指向相同物件的執行個體。It does not determine whether the two instances refer to the same object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventID As Integer
public: property int EventID { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("An ID number for this event entry.")
System.Obsolete("This property has been deprecated. Please use System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.InstanceId instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 取得目前事件項目的應用程式特定事件識別項。

span.span: Gets the application-specific event identifier for the current event entry.

value.span: 事件訊息的應用程式特定識別項。

span.span: The application-specific identifier for the event message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件記錄檔前, 兩個位元遮罩關閉，這個值代表事件識別項的項目。This value represents the event identifier for the entry in the event log, with the top two bits masked off. 屬性的事件記錄檔項目表示完整的 32 位元的資源識別項中的事件來源的訊息資源檔的事件。The property for an event log entry represents the full 32-bit resource identifier for the event in the message resource file for the event source. 從相同來源的兩個事件記錄檔項目可以具有相符值，但具有不同由於差異事件識別碼的前兩個位元的值。Two event log entries from the same source can have matching values, but have different values due to differences in the top two bits of the event identifier. 如果應用程式所撰寫的事件項目，使用其中一種方法，屬性比對選擇性`eventId`參數。If the application wrote the event entry using one of the methods, the property matches the optional `eventId` parameter. 如果應用程式可讓您撰寫使用事件或 Win32 API `ReportEvent`，則屬性符合遮罩關閉前的兩個位元，針對該事件的資源識別碼。If the application wrote the event using or the Win32 API `ReportEvent`, the property matches the resource identifier for the event, with the top two bits masked off.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得事件記錄檔中這個項目的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of this entry in the event log.

value.span: 事件記錄檔中這個項目的索引。

span.span: The index of this entry in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個數字不一定是以零為起始。This number is not necessarily zero-based.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceId As Long
public: property long InstanceId { long get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The instance ID for this event entry.")

summary.span: 取得資源識別項，指定事件項目的訊息文字。

span.span: Gets the resource identifier that designates the message text of the event entry.

value.span: 資源識別項，其對應到事件來源的訊息資源檔中的字串定義。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string definition in the message resource file of the event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可唯一識別設定的事件來源的事件項目。The property uniquely identifies an event entry for a configured event source. 事件記錄檔項目所代表的事件來源的訊息資源檔中事件的完整的 32 位元資源識別項。The for an event log entry represents the full 32-bit resource identifier for the event in the message resource file for the event source. 屬性等於與遮罩關閉前的兩個位元。The property equals the with the top two bits masked off. 從相同來源的兩個事件記錄檔項目可以具有相符值，但具有不同由於差異的資源識別碼的前兩個位元的值。Two event log entries from the same source can have matching values, but have different values due to differences in the top two bits of the resource identifier. 如果應用程式所撰寫的事件項目，使用其中一種方法，屬性比對選擇性`eventId`參數。If the application wrote the event entry using one of the methods, the property matches the optional `eventId` parameter. 如果應用程式可讓您撰寫使用事件，則屬性會比對中指定的資源識別碼的`instance`參數。If the application wrote the event using , the property matches the resource identifier specified in the of the `instance` parameter. 如果應用程式撰寫了使用 Win32 API 的事件`ReportEvent`，則屬性會比對中指定的資源識別碼`dwEventID`參數。If the application wrote the event using the Win32 API `ReportEvent`, the property matches the resource identifier specified in the `dwEventID` parameter. 如定義事件訊息及建置事件記錄檔資源檔案的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題中的平台 SDK 文件，網址[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](https://msdn.microsoft.com/). 如需有關事件記錄檔識別碼的詳細資訊，請參閱 Platform SDK 中的 < 事件識別碼 > 主題。For details about event log identifiers, see the "Event Identifiers" topic in the Platform SDK. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會搜尋事件記錄檔的特定資源識別碼的項目。The following code example searches an event log for entries with a particular resource identifier. 在程式碼範例會顯示事件訊息以取得每個相符的項目，並計算記錄檔中的相符項目的總數。The code example displays the event message for each matching entry, and counts the total number of matching entries in the log. 訊息文字，每個項目可能會或可能不相同，每個事件訊息是依事件來源訊息檔案插入字串，它撰寫時所使用參數而定。The message text for each entry may or may not be the same; each event message depends on the event source message file, insertion strings, and parameters used when it was written. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#10)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#10)]

value.span: 含有事件記錄檔的電腦名稱。

span.span: The name of the computer that contains the event log.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.ComponentModel.Design.BinaryEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.ComponentModel.Design.BinaryEditor, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得與這個事件項目相關聯的當地語系化訊息。

span.span: Gets the localized message associated with this event entry.

value.span: 訊息的格式化、當地語系化文字。

span.span: The formatted, localized text for the message.

value.span: 包括相關聯的取代字串。

span.span: This includes associated replacement strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會開啟登錄，以判斷包含當地語系化的文字的.dll 檔案的檔案名稱。Getting this property opens the registry to determine the file name of the .dll file that contains the localized text. 如果測試您的程式碼時，您會收到登錄時發生錯誤，請確認電腦上存在的.dll 檔案。If you receive a registry error when testing your source code, verify that the .dll file exists on the computer. 如果訊息中包含插入字串，則請在其配置中捕捉錯誤。If insertion strings are included in the message, catch errors in their allocation.

exception.span: 無法將空間配置給與訊息相關聯的其中一個插入字串。

span.span: The space could not be allocated for one of the insertion strings associated with the message.

public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ReplacementStrings { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the replacement strings associated with the event log entry.

value.span: 陣列，保留儲存於事件項目中的取代字串。

span.span: An array that holds the replacement strings stored in the event entry.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Source As String
public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The source application of this event entry.")

summary.span: 取得產生這個事件的應用程式名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the application that generated this event.

value.span: 使用事件記錄檔登錄為這個事件來源的名稱。

span.span: The name registered with the event log as the source of this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件來源表示記錄事件的內容。The event source indicates what logged the event. 通常是應用程式的名稱或子元件的應用程式名稱如果很大的應用程式。It is often the name of the application or the name of a subcomponent of the application if the application is large. 應用程式和服務通常寫入 （並因此會為來源） 應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。Applications and services usually write to (and therefore are sources for) the Application log or a custom log. 裝置驅動程式通常會寫入至系統記錄檔。Device drivers usually write to the System log. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此範例中，`switch`陳述式會使用主控台輸入來搜尋指定的事件記錄檔項目。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified . 如果找到相符項目，則屬性資訊會顯示在主控台中。If a match is found, the property information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeGenerated As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeGenerated { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得產生這個事件的當地時間。

span.span: Gets the local time at which this event was generated.

value.span: 產生這個事件的當地時間。

span.span: The local time at which this event was generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成員會包含產生事件的時間。This member holds the time that an event was generated. 這可能不是與事件資訊寫入事件記錄檔的時間相同。This might not be the same as the time when the event information was written to the event log. 對於後者，讀取屬性。For the latter, read the property. 通常是在產生事件的時間和資料庫記錄的時間之間的延遲。There is usually a lag between the time that an event is generated and the time it is logged. 很多一定要知道事件產生時，除非您想要查看記錄中是否有明顯的延遲。It is more important to know when the event was generated, unless you want to see if there is a significant lag in logging. 如果您的記錄檔位於不同的伺服器上，而且您遇到瓶頸，可以發生的項目。That can happen if your log files are on a different server and you are experiencing a bottleneck.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeWritten As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeWritten { DateTime get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The time at which this event entry was written to the logfile.")

summary.span: 取得將這個事件寫入至記錄檔的當地時間。

span.span: Gets the local time at which this event was written to the log.

value.span: 這個事件寫入至記錄檔的當地時間。

span.span: The local time at which this event was written to the log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成員會包含事件的資訊會寫入事件記錄檔的時間。This member holds the time that an event's information is written to the event log. 這可能不是與事件產生時相同的時間。This might not be the same time as when the event was generated. 對於後者，讀取屬性。For the latter, read the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserName As String
public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The name of a user associated with this event entry.")

summary.span: 取得為這個事件負責的使用者名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the user who is responsible for this event.

value.span: 安全識別項 (SID)，可以唯一識別使用者或群組。

span.span: The security identifier (SID) that uniquely identifies a user or group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常是空白以外的安全性記錄檔記錄中的事件。This property is often blank for events in logs other than the Security log.

exception.span: 無法為使用者的 SID 取得帳戶資訊。

span.span: Account information could not be obtained for the user's SID.
